Text:
I really hope this isn't an April Fools joke.

Thanks if it's real though.
its real, wanted more people to see it, enjoy!

Doesn't play on (UK) PS3 or Mac. Due to "disc copy protection could not be verified" error.

Plays fine using VLC though.
Much thanks for this. Is there any chance of getting a re-rip though with the commentaries and bonus features intact?
Not fake, but the menu is broken - can play the Vob files though

Thanks! In my country is very expensive to get this DVD... it's bad the menu are not working, but thanks anyway.. Fishbone is one of my favorite bands and is in my top 5 best shows of my life, i hope they come here again someday.
